title: April 15
description:
Milo has started asking for a bedtime song that Felix made up years ago called "Baby Dog Go To Sleep". The lyrics are just that, repeated over and over in a tuneless chant. He prefers Felix to sing it, but will accept Lucie doing it.

Felix, encouraged by his song's rave reviews, has undertaken a new song. It's not finished yet. But it starts in the same tuneless chant: "Springtime, everything's blooming, pear tree's blooming, Springtime..."

Dean and Felix have been reading Ramona The Pest. It's a classic book about a girl starting kindergarden. Ramona takes her favorite doll to Show & Tell. Now Felix is excited to bring his real dinosaur fossil to kindergarden's Show & Tell. He's even making us make sure that Ecole Bilingue has Show & Tell when we go to Orientation next month.

Milo's been saying he wants to go to Keenan-garden too.

Felix has been asking a lot about numbers lately, and doing simple addition and subtraction (like answering "What's one and two and one?") Today he asked Dean to count as high as he could. Dean realized that Felix thought each number was going to be as hard to remember as the first ten have been, so told Felix that the numbers quickly start to repeat. Dean counted to twenty-one and asked Felix, "then comes twenty...?" and Felix shouted "TWO!". It was off to the races after that: he helped Dean count to 105!

children.title: Mr. Cool
children.description: Baby Dog barks when the paparazzi get too close.

children.title: Counting
children.description:
Felix has developed an interest in numbers. Here, he is selling beads from his jewelry donkey. These days, we often hear him musing "5 is 3 and 2, but 5 is also 2 and 2 and 1", or something in that vein, while intently observing his fingers.

He's also been playing board games. In the last two weeks we started playing Connect Four, checkers and a really cool super tic-tac-toe game called Gobblet.

children.title: Darshan
children.description: Darshan came over for a playdate. He is a charismatic energetic boy's boy.

children.title: Egg Hunt 1
children.description: Another egg hunt! Eli (showing off his loot) and his parents hosted a post-Easter party for the yogakids. Kai (with pink basket) is sampling the goods, while Lexi, Ariel, Felix and Saia ransack the living room in search of more booty.

children.title: Egg Hunt 2
children.description: Milo hasn't tired of egg hunts. In fact, Felix has been organizing some for Milo. Felix hides all our empty plastic eggs in a room, then Milo has to find them.

children.title: Egg Hunt 3
children.description: The second wave of yogababies has arrived! This is Lila, Saia's brand new baby sister. Lila, resting in her grand-mother's arms, is 16 days old. Jaime also got a baby sister, Tess, who was born a couple of months ago.

children.title: Egg Hunt 4
children.description:
On couch, starting from front left Milo, Lucie, Felix, Clara, Saia, Clara's mom, baby Lila, Sara, Argil, Sara, Leo, Ashleigh, Lexi, Celia, Ariel.

In front of couch, left to rigth Jen, Kai, Amy, Eliot, Katie, baby Tess and Jaime.

children.title: Maria1
children.description: We paid Jordan and Dylan a surprise visit and bumped into Maria! Jordan and her family are moving to New Zealand in a few months.

children.title: Maria2
children.description:
Maria is walking again and getting stronger.

Milo was coy at first, but eventually rememembered how much he likes Maria. At one point he told Lucie "You go home, I stay."

children.title: Reading
children.description: When Milo is hurt or upset, the best way to calm him down is reading. In fact he often sobs "I want a book" while crying.

children.title: Superdad1
children.description: It's fun to have a strong dad.
